mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTNER_DOCTOR( MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_PHOTO, PROFILE_CONTENTS, PROFILE_EDUCATION, CLINIC_INFO, CLINIC_PHONE, CLINIC_EMAIL, REG_DATE ) VALUES( #{memberNo}, #{profilePhoto}, #{profileContents}, #{profileEducation}, #{clinicInfo}, #{clinicPhone}, #{clinicEmail}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET ADDR1=#{addr1}, EDIT_DATE=sysdate, ADDR2=#{addr2}, ADDR3=#{addr3}, POSTCODE=#{postcode} WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(MEDITATION MEDITATION_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, a.MEMBER_NO, a.NAME, a.GENDER, a.ADDR1, b.PROFILE_PHOTO, b.PROFILE_CONTENTS, b.PROFILE_EDUCATION, b.COMMENTSCNT, C.CATEGORY_1, C.CATEGORY_2, C.CATEGORY_3 FROM MEMBER a join PARTNER_DOCTOR b on a.MEMBER_NO=b.MEMBER_NO JOIN MENTAL_SUBJECT c ON b.MEMBER_NO=c.DOC_NO ) WHERE
MEMBER_NO > 0

SELECT * FROM( SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(MEDITATION MEDITATION_PK) */ ROWNUM RN, a.MEMBER_NO, a.NAME, a.GENDER, a.ADDR1, b.PROFILE_PHOTO, b.PROFILE_CONTENTS, b.PROFILE_EDUCATION, b.COMMENTSCNT, C.CATEGORY_1, C.CATEGORY_2, C.CATEGORY_3 FROM MEMBER a join PARTNER_DOCTOR b on a.MEMBER_NO=b.MEMBER_NO JOIN MENTAL_SUBJECT c ON b.MEMBER_NO=c.DOC_NO WHERE
ROWNUM <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) WHERE RN > (#{pageNum}-1)* #{amount}

SELECT a.MEMBER_NO, a.NAME, a.GENDER, a.ADDR1, a.ADDR2, a.ADDR3, a.POSTCODE, b.PROFILE_PHOTO, b.PROFILE_CONTENTS, b.PROFILE_EDUCATION, b.CLINIC_INFO, b.CLINIC_PHONE, b.CLINIC_EMAIL FROM MEMBER a join PARTNER_DOCTOR b on a.MEMBER_NO=b.MEMBER_NO where b.MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_NO, PROFILE_CONTENTS, PROFILE_EDUCATION, CLINIC_INFO, CLINIC_PHONE, CLINIC_EMAIL FROM PARTNER_DOCTOR WHERE MEMBER_NO=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTNER_DOCTOR SET PROFILE_EDUCATION = #{profileEducation} WHERE MEMBER_NO =#{memberNo}
mapper.select: SELECT CLINIC_INFO FROM PARTNER_DOCTOR WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NO, M.NAME, M.GENDER, M.ADDR1, D.PROFILE_PHOTO, D.PROFILE_CONTENTS, D.PROFILE_EDUCATION, D.COMMENTSCNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN PARTNER_DOCTOR D ON (M.MEMBER_NO = D.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MENTAL_SUBJECT S ON (D.MEMBER_NO = S.DOC_NO) WHERE S.CATEGORY_1 = #{category1} OR S.CATEGORY_2 = #{category2} OR S.CATEGORY_3 = #{category3}
